x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement:
Generational Knowledge Loss Crisis: Every day, invaluable life stories, family histories, and cultural wisdom disappear forever when elderly individuals pass away. Key challenges include:
Lost Heritage: 70% of family stories are never recorded, creating permanent gaps in family history Social Isolation: Elderly individuals in care facilities lack meaningful engagement and purpose Therapeutic Gaps: Healthcare providers need better tools to support mental health through storytelling therapy Grieving Process: Families struggle to process loss without preserved memories and wisdom Cultural Erosion: Communities lose historical knowledge and traditional practices with each generation

How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

ServiceNow Platform Components:

  1. Service Portal: User-friendly interface for story recording, family collaboration, and memory browsing
  2. Knowledge Management: Organize and categorize life stories, wisdom entries, and family histories with powerful search capabilities
  3. Workflow Engine: Automate story review processes, family notifications, and memorial creation workflows
  4. Case Management: Track individual legacy projects, family collaboration progress, and therapeutic goals
  5. Performance Analytics: Dashboard showing engagement metrics, story completion rates, and therapeutic outcomes
  6. Mobile App: Simple mobile interface for elderly users to record stories and view family contributions
  7. AI/ML Capabilities: Generate personalized memory prompts and automatically transcribe voice recordings
  8. Integration Hub: Connect with healthcare systems, family tree services, and digital storage platforms
  9. Virtual Agent: AI assistant to guide users through story recording and provide conversation prompts
